isis.stitle: CAB: 4100, 4200, 4300 AND 4400 MODELS - REMOVE - CAB DOOR WINDOW ELECTRIC MOTOR

svcsubproc.title: Remove Front Cab Door Window Electric Motor on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for all Models

figure.caption: Figure 79. Front Cab Door Window Electric Motor on Standard or Extended Cab Models and Crew Cab Models

step1.para: Remove front cab door trim panel, refer to CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL . If front cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Remove Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks. If front cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Remove Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks.

Remove front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
. For removing front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to Remove Front Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for all Models.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 79 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Disconnect wiring harness connector (Item 1) from connector on cab door window electric motor (Item 2), driver side shown.

Remove three hex nuts (Item 3) securing cab door window electric motor (Item 2) to modular door hardware assembly (Item 4). Using a flat blade screw driver carefully pry the cab door window electric motor away from modular door hardware assembly, driver side shown. Lay it out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.
Repeat procedure to remove passenger side front cab door window electric motor.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Rear Cab Door Window Electric Motor on Crew Cab for all Models

step1.para: Remove rear cab door trim panel, refer to CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL . If rear cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Remove Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks. If rear cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Remove Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks.

Remove rear cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
. For removing rear cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to Remove Rear Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield on Crew Cab for all Models.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 80 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Disconnect wiring harness connector (Item 1) from connector on cab door window electric motor (Item 2), driver side shown.

Remove three hex nuts (Item 3) securing cab door window electric motor (Item 2) to modular door hardware assembly (Item 4). Using a flat blade screw driver, carefully pry the cab door window electric motor away from modular door hardware assembly, driver side shown. Lay it out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 80. Rear Cab Door Window Electric Motor on Crew Cab Models

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove passenger side rear cab door window electric motor.
